title: Marie Catrib's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, Lebanese, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a range of Greek, Mediterranean, and American dishes with signature vegan dishes like sweet potato quinoa burger, Larry David sandwich, and other Lebanese items on the menu. In deli case regular items are vegan galettes, quiches, lasagnas and a variety of desserts, as well deli salads. Very busy at lunchtime, so go early or expect a wait.
